resources.string: Snowcem Dealer Finder needs an update !
To update this, download the latest version
We are so glad to see you.
This scheme would be part of “Beurer Together-Stronger” initiative of Beurer Group.\n
The scheme shall be initially available from 1st August 2017 and shall be valid till 31st March 2020.\n
This scheme is limited to Beurer copier paper only and cannot be clubbed with any other paper.\n
The scheme can be either extended or closed early at the sole discretion of the management. The participant shall have no right to challenge the discretion of the management.\n

This scheme shall be available only for the Channel Partner (Retailers, Stationers & Jobbers) involved in sale of Beurer copier paper it shall not be applicable for dealers/distributors and consumers including the end consumer. However the scheme can be extended to other persons in future at the sole discretion of Beurer.\n

The enrolling Channel Partner have to ensure that they furnish information in its true form and any misrepresented information will result in permanent disqualification, from the Scheme and all other schemes run by Beurer.\n
Beurer reserves the right to change, modify, alter or close the scheme at any point of time without giving any reason(s) and intimation(s) for the same.\n

Beurer reserves the right to disqualify any participant from the scheme and /or any other Company or Agency run program/scheme, without assigning any reason / intimation / justification thereof to the aggrieved Channel Partner or any other person.\n
Beurer reserves the right for the computation of the reward mechanics, which shall be final, conclusive and binding on the Channel Partner and will not be liable to be disputed or questioned.\n

Channel Partner do not have the option to take CASH in lieu of any kind of rewards/incentives. The Points will be redeemed only against products, vouchers, bank/gift cards,PayTM or services as featured in the Rewards catalogue. Redemption of Reward Points against any outstanding or payments due to Company, Dealer, Distributor, Wholesaler, Retailer or any of the Channel Partner is not permissible.\n

All participating Channel Partner should compulsorily provide a Mobile Number /Contact Number. Beurer will not be responsible for any mails or text messages transmitted from those Mobile Numbers. The participant expressly waives off any right/title/interest in the information/mails/messages provided/sent by them including but not limited to right to privacy and intellectual property rights.\n

Beurer or its representing agency will not be responsible for products or vouchers stolen, damaged or lost in transit and no other query would be entertained later related to dissatisfaction of gift once it is received.\n
Product received in damaged condition should be reported within 24 hours. Beurer or its working agency will not be responsible for the same later on.\n
Please check the availability of stores of any gift voucher before placing the order; Beurer or its working agency will not be responsible for any store unavailability later on.\n

Channel Partners may redeem there gifts quarterly or annually. Redemption request once given to the agency or Beurer cannot be cancelled or withdrawn or changed. On redemption, the Rewards Points would automatically be subtracted from the accumulated balance.\n

Goods will reach the Channel Partner within 4-6 weeks of receipt of the order subject to availability of funds. Notwithstanding the same, Beurer will not be held liable for any delay beyond this time period.\n

It is expressly agreed that in case of any dispute whether direct or indirect arising out of the said scheme shall be governed by the laws of India and any dispute, difference or claim which may arise in connection with the said scheme hereto shall be only under the jurisdiction of the law courts of the city of Barnala, Punjab.\n
For detailed terms and condition please refer our website\n
Welcome to the rewarding work of Ramaply group
